mapper.select: SELECT patient_id AS patientId, patient_no AS patientNo, name, gender, birthday, id_card AS idCard, address FROM patient WHERE (#{name} IS NULL OR name LIKE CONCAT('%', #{name}, '%')) AND (#{idCard} IS NULL OR id_card LIKE CONCAT('%', #{idCard}, '%'))
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO patient (patient_no, name, gender, birthday, id_card, address) VALUES (#{patientNo}, #{name}, #{gender}, #{birthday}, #{idCard}, #{address})
